item.title: An Update on Aurelia 2 Documentation and Tutorials
item.description: Here at Aurelia HQ, we have been busy beavers. Work on Aurelia 2 continues full steam ahead. We are doing more frequent development releases. You might have noticed we are engaging the community a little bit better after the noticeable silence.
item.pubDate: Fri Jul 02 2021 09:57:57 GMT+1000 (Australian Eastern Standard Time)

item.title: Aurelia 2 Update - Alpha 8
item.description: Hi everyone, we hope you have been staying healthy and safe in these uncertain times we still find ourselves in. Unfortunately, things slowed down a bit in Aurelia land over the last few months due to unforeseen circumstances. We are happy to report that we've now been able to adapt to these changes, and you're going to see more releases and development work as we focus on completing Aurelia 2. We also realize that a lot of the work that has been done can easily be missed if you're not watching the GitHub [https://github.com/aurelia/aurelia], so make sure you keep an eye on that one too.
item.pubDate: Tue Jun 22 2021 15:44:14 GMT+1000 (Australian Eastern Standard Time)

item.title: The Aurelia 2 Alpha Release Is Now Available
item.description: We are excited to announce that the Aurelia 2 alpha is now ready for download
item.pubDate: Wed Mar 03 2021 20:42:13 GMT+1100 (Australian Eastern Daylight Time)

item.title: The Aurelia 2 alpha is coming
item.description: As many of you know, we have been hard at work on the next version of Aurelia known as Aurelia 2 for quite some time now. Despite some obstacles (including an ongoing global pandemic), we are happy to announce we are releasing an alpha version of Aurelia 2 on March 2nd, 2021.
item.pubDate: Fri Feb 12 2021 22:15:28 GMT+1100 (Australian Eastern Daylight Time)

item.title: Happy New Year and Happy New Aurelia
item.pubDate: Sun Jan 03 2021 14:50:57 GMT+1100 (Australian Eastern Daylight Time)

item.title: Aurelia Release Notes - March 2020
item.description: This month we've got major releases of aurelia-i18n, aurelia-dialog, and aurelia-pal-nodejs. However, the most significant release is a minor release of Aurelia UX, which includes many improvements to the components and styles.
item.pubDate: Tue Mar 03 2020 14:49:20 GMT+1100 (Australian Eastern Daylight Time)

item.title: Solace and Aurelia Battleship Game Course
item.description: Today, I'm excited to introduce you to Thomas Kunnumpurath, from Solace. Solace has put together a free course on creating a game of Battleship with Aurelia (TypeScript), Spring Cloud Stream (Java), and Solace PubSub+. It's a great way to learn the basics of messaging and event-driven architecture with the Aurelia framework.
item.pubDate: Tue Feb 04 2020 15:19:52 GMT+1100 (Australian Eastern Daylight Time)

item.title: Aurelia Release Notes - January 2020
item.description: Happy New Year! And with the new year, we've got new tools. Today we're excited to share a major upgrade to Aurelia's VS Code Extension.
item.pubDate: Thu Jan 02 2020 16:14:08 GMT+1100 (Australian Eastern Daylight Time)

item.title: Aurelia SlickGrid
item.description: Today, I'm pleased to introduce Ghislain, a member of the Aurelia community who has been working on a fantastic data grid for Aurelia. Read on to learn more about his open source work.
item.pubDate: Wed Dec 11 2019 16:53:48 GMT+1100 (Australian Eastern Daylight Time)

item.title: Aurelia on GitHub Sponsored Organizations
item.description: Today, we're pleased to share that Aurelia was selected by GitHub to be one of the first open source organizations to participate in their new GitHub Sponsored Organizations program!
item.pubDate: Thu Nov 14 2019 05:31:53 GMT+1100 (Australian Eastern Daylight Time)

item.title: Aurelia vNext - 2019 Fall Update
item.description: As we approach the first major release of Aurelia vNext, we've got a special treat for you. It's time to announce the official framework name and provided a more in-depth look into the work that's been done so far and what's next to come.
item.pubDate: Thu Oct 31 2019 18:01:32 GMT+1100 (Australian Eastern Daylight Time)

item.title: Aurelia Goes Full-time
item.description: Last week we hit a major milestone in Aurelia's history: one of our core team members, Fred Kleuver, was funded to work full-time on Aurelia.
item.pubDate: Thu Oct 17 2019 21:42:22 GMT+1100 (Australian Eastern Daylight Time)

item.title: Aurelia Release Notes - September 2019
item.description: This month, we've got a number of improvements and fixes to the Aurelia CLI, as well as a number of smaller updates to various parts of Aurelia's core and its plugins. Stay tuned for our upcoming blog post on Aurelia vNext!
item.pubDate: Wed Sep 11 2019 09:40:15 GMT+1000 (Australian Eastern Standard Time)

item.title: Case Study: Tutors
item.description: Today, I'm pleased to introduce you to Eamonn de Leastar from the Waterford Institute of Technology. He's built an impressive set of learning technologies for the institute using Aurelia. Here he is to tell you all about it and provide some opportunities to get involved as well.
item.pubDate: Wed Sep 04 2019 15:48:25 GMT+1000 (Australian Eastern Standard Time)

item.title: Advanced i18n with Aurelia and Net at Work GmbH
item.description: Net at Work GmbH [https://www.netatwork.de/] is a product-based consultancy company with a glowing feather in its cap: NoSpamProxy [https://www.nospamproxy.de/en/]. NoSpamProxy is a multi-faceted secure email gateway solution aimed at providing powerful anti-spam and anti-malware capabilities. Moreover, it provides a number of other functionalities such as email encryption, large file transmission, and email disclaimer management.
item.pubDate: Mon Aug 05 2019 08:38:23 GMT+1000 (Australian Eastern Standard Time)

item.title: Case Study: Evolution Software's Hazelnut Monitor
item.description: Today, I'm pleased to introduce you to Michael Gerfen and Andy Gray from Evolution Software, sharing a bit about their company and the Hazelnut Monitor product. Take it away Michael and Andy!
item.pubDate: Wed Jun 19 2019 16:55:35 GMT+1000 (Australian Eastern Standard Time)

item.title: Aurelia Release Notes - June 2019
item.description: Today, we're pleased to share with you the 1.0 release of the Aurelia CLI!
item.pubDate: Mon Jun 03 2019 14:58:40 GMT+1000 (Australian Eastern Standard Time)

item.title: Aurelia Release Notes - May 2019
item.description: This month's releases include an update to our Webpack plugin, more improvements to UI virtualization, additional conversion of Aurelia libraries to TypeScript, for improved maintenance and contributor-friendliness, and a few bug and package fixes to other libraries.
item.pubDate: Mon May 06 2019 13:17:10 GMT+1000 (Australian Eastern Standard Time)

item.title: Case Study: Stellarport
item.description: Today, I'm pleased to introduce Ishai Strauss from Stellarport to talk about how they've built their product with Aurelia. Read on to hear from Ishai about Stellarport's experiences integrating Redux with Aurelia and leveraging decorator-based composition with Aurelia's Fetch client.
item.pubDate: Mon Apr 22 2019 13:50:19 GMT+1000 (Australian Eastern Standard Time)

item.title: Aurelia Release Notes - April 2019
item.description: Today, we're excited to announce the beta of Aurelia's Web Components plugin, enabling you to use your Aurelia custom elements as Web Component standard custom elements, easily inter-operating with other frameworks.
item.pubDate: Tue Apr 02 2019 18:27:08 GMT+1100 (Australian Eastern Daylight Time)

item.description: Today we're please to introduce one of our Aurelia community members, Giray Temel, to share with you about Codeline's choice of and experience with Aurelia. Take it away Giray!

item.title: Aurelia Release Notes - Early February 2019
item.description: We've had a few new releases over the last few weeks. Among them are continued updates to the Aurelia CLI. In fact, we found an issue in the CLI that affected new Webpack projects, so be sure to update your CLI before starting anything new. More details concerning the various releases can be found below.
